Field.Label: configure UP and DOWN choices for device

Field.tooltip: pick one
Field.Label: which info to be used for status updates

List.Option: SWITCH AND DHCP info: using SW-upTime or DHCP-AGE to keep status UP

Field.Label: configure DOWN status change, use what info to determine if device is offline

Field.tooltip: FastDown: use message, (and not inLIST =dict)to go from up to down; IdleTime: if idelTime GT xx go down immediately; UpTime: go gown immediately if upTime does not change; Wait .. after not inList; start expiration timer
Field.Label: pick one method:

List.Option: FastDown = after disconnect message from AP, down immediately
IdleTime = idle time is gt xx .. secs since last AP-WiFi connect
UpTime = WiFi uptime does not increase
optimized, stay up = if AP-msg OR (AP-dict with uptime Increase OR IdelTime lt xx ).. takes a longer time to go down
Wait until the device disappears from the UniFi Wifi Devices tables

Field.tooltip: Idle time must be GT xx seconds to go to DOWN
Field.Label: max idle time seconds:

Field.tooltip: checks AGE from DICT info(see state AGE) every time the DICT (DCHP hosts table) is read from GW. This works for devices that disappear whithout saying good bye
Field.Label: This will use DHCP-AGE, if AGE GT xx device goes UP to DOWN

Field.tooltip: if off it will be using the normal expiration time if no change in uptime
Field.Label: This will use use SWITCH-upTime, if not changed set status to down

Field.tooltip: this will use an http get of stat/alluser to get last_seen info from controller db
Field.Label: Enable to use the controller DB info for Up -> Down status change

ConfigUI.Field: > When enabled plugin will check the controller db info for last_seen time if other info suggest up->down to confirm or supspend up->down. This might be usefull if the communication with the individual AP gives sometimes faulty down info. If in config enabled for all or off, this setting is ignored, this setting is only used if in config it is set to "per device"

Field.tooltip: overwrites common expiration time set in config
Field.Label: set individual time for UP to DOWN to EXPIRED for THIS device

Field.tooltip: this will enable plugin-plugin bc of status changes ie to EVENTS plugin
Field.Label: double check status going to DOWN with ping:

Field.tooltip: this will enable plugin-plugin bc of status changes ie to EVENTS plugin
Field.Label: double check status going to UP with ping:

Field.tooltip: used only for wifi devices, might help them stay up sends a magic packet to the MAC number, once eevry xx sec AND if down, will also follow up with a ping
Field.Label: send Wake On Lan package to device every:

Field.tooltip: this will enable plugin-plugin bc of status changes ie to EVENTS plugin
Field.Label: send broadcasts to other plugins for status up/x changes

List.Option: YES send BC, must be enabled in config

Field.tooltip: overwrites common expiration time set in config
Field.Label: set individual time for UP to DOWN to EXPIRED for THIS device

Field.tooltip: gateways have diferent MACs decide which to use for controller querries
Field.Label: :send broadcasts to other plugins for status up/x changes

Field.tooltip: failover: internet switches from wan(down) to wan2(up), need to have 2 internet connections setup and wan2 setup as failover, copy publicIP, nameserver, gateways
Field.Label: In case of a wan failover event:

List.Option: keep publicIP separated from wan2PublicIP state
